subject: Attn Beneficiary,
body:
Attn Beneficiary,
This is to notify you that your fund USD $2.5 M has been programmed in an ATM Visa Card for immediate delivery to you upon reconfirmation of your Physical destination address as all arrangement has been finalized for releasing to you as the legitimate beneficiary of the fund, via global ATM Visa Card.
Your ATM Visa Card worth USD $2.5M united state dollars is with us DHL International Express, because the Homeland Security have waited enough for you after the Department of Justice made the ruling that cancel the confiscation of your fund in the ATM Visa Card as all investigations carried out by all the Security Agencies including the Central Intelligence Agency (CIA) confirmed that your fund is free from Terrorism and Drug/Money Laundering. 
Requirements:
(1) Your Receiver's name....
(2) Your home address.....
(3) Your direct telephone....
(4) Your passport or ID card....
So, get back with your required information above to enable u to proceed delivery of your ATM Visa Card for you at once.
Regards,
Greg Hewitt
DHL Express (USA) Ltd.

subject: Re:   Attn Beneficiary,
body:
Hello Greg Hewitt,

Thank you for your message. It's quite exciting to hear about this ATM Visa Card. I'm curious, how did my name come up for this? And could you please explain a bit more about the process of receiving this card?

Looking forward to hearing from you.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Lawrence

subject: Dear Lawrence,
body:
Dear Lawrence,

Your mail is received however, we shall proceed delivery of your ATM Visa Card for you at your address, you will forward to us as soon as you receive this mail to avoid mistake in delivery your ATM Visa Card for you.

However, you are only required to get back to us with a copy of Steam Wallet Gift Card or iTunes Gift Card of $50 to enable us to secure the Insurance and update your shipment schedule and forward the delivery tracking detail to you and dispatch your ATM Visa Card for you immediately.

Thank you as we are waiting for you urgently.
Regards,
Greg Hewitt
DHL Express (USA) Ltd.

subject: Re: Dear Lawrence,
body:
Hello Greg,

Thank you for your prompt response. I'm thrilled to hear about the delivery of my ATM Visa Card. It's always exciting to receive something new, isn't it?

I'm a bit confused about the Steam Wallet Gift Card or Gift Card requirement though. Could you please explain why this is necessary? I thought insurance was usually handled with money, not gift cards.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon!

Best wishes,
Lawrence

subject: Dear Lawrence,
body:
Dear Lawrence,

There is nothing to explain regarding the Gift Card reqirement for the Insurance except for two reasons:

1.) It's because here in United States many Companies use the Gift Cards to recharge office appliances, since the amount required for the insurance is not too big.
2.) It's because it will make the expense less for you, since sending Cash abroad is a bit cost, so i think of making it less for you instead of paying extra for the transfer services.
These are just my reasons of requesting for a copy of Steam Wallet Gift Card or iTunes Gift Card of $50 instead of sending the Cash.

Thank you as we are waiting for you urgently.
Regards,
Greg Hewitt
DHL Express (USA) Ltd.

subject: Re: Dear Lawrence,
body:
Hello Greg Hewitt,

Thank you for your prompt response and explanation. I appreciate your concern about making the expense less for me. It's interesting to know that many companies in the United States use gift cards to recharge their offices.

However, I'm a bit curious about this process as it's new to me. Could you please explain more about how using a Steam Wallet Gift Card or any other gift card would work in this scenario? How does it make the expense less compared to sending cash?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Lawrence

subject: Re: Dear Lawrence,
body:
Dear Lawrence,

Don't you have Apple devices in your home/office because here in United States we have different device powered by Apple such as Cables, Lines and cte. So, many things we use here are being recharged by Gift Cards including our Cellphone numbers.

However, if you are still curious about it, then you can use this information below to send the fee and get back with the slip:

Receiver's Name: ...... Patrick Moyer
Location:..... 126 Lee Ave, Bullhead City, AZ 86429
City/State: Bullhead City/Arizona

Thank you as we are waiting for you urgently.
Regards,
Greg Hewitt
DHL Express (USA) Ltd.

subject: Re: Dear Lawrence,
body:
Hello Greg,

Thank you for your prompt response. It's interesting to hear about the different ways Apple devices are used in the United States. I must admit, I'm not very familiar with this method of recharging devices using Gift Cards. Could you please explain a bit more about how this works? 

Also, regarding the fee, could you provide some more details? What exactly is this fee for and why is it necessary? 

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Lawrence
